scripts.concat: echo "<!-- Auto generated with 'npm run concat' -->" > ruby-object-model.md; cat src/intro.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/basics.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/classes.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/scope.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/declarations.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/messages.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/members.md >>  ruby-object-model.md; cat src/singleton.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/methods.md >> ruby-object-model.md; cat src/constants.md >> ruby-object-model.md;
scripts.all: rm -rf docs && mkdir -p docs && cp -r diagrams docs && npm run concat && npm run toc && npm run html && npm run pdf
